text: There's Something about Mary is a 1998 American comedy movie. It stars Ben Stiller, Matt Dillon and Cameron Diaz and its subject is dysfunctional relationships. It was directed by Farrelly brothers. Its comedy is a combination of romance and gross-out. It is set in Rhode Island and Miami, Florida. == Other websites == * Category:1998 romantic comedy movies Category:1990s sex comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Rhode Island in fiction
title: There's Something About Mary
